name: Wing Pro 7 - Commercial Use Upgrade
detailed_description: Purchasing this upgrade gives you the right to use Wing Pro 7 also for commercial (non-hobby) uses.
about_the_game: Purchasing this upgrade gives you the right to use Wing Pro 7 also for commercial (non-hobby) uses.
short_description: Commercial Use Upgrade for Wing Pro 7.
